formdata.description: This is the name of the icon that is being uploaded, it will be used as reference for searching if the id is not passed, it is also used for displaying a name to the user when providing the icon.
This is the price of the item that the user has to pay before owning it.
This is the type of icon being uploaded (ex: hat, belt, etc)
This is the gender to which the icon is intended to.
This is the season in which said icon is meant to be used.
This is the colour that will be used by default
This is the image to be uploaded to the server to be a new icon.
